Why not wait for clean energy to be competitive?
Because the ice caps are melting! Because scale matters.

Does green bank undercut carbon tax?
No, it creates substitutes for carbon energy. So that consumers can switch away from carbon.
Why do private lenders need green bank? Because green bank does marketing and origination and administration (cont) http://t.co/yFkAnKa96s

Does green bank compete with private lenders?
No, it minimizes green bank finances and maximizes private funding.

Does green bank do concessional finance? 
No, it never finances negative npv. It maximizes interest rate given competitive off take price.
